title: I have not heard Rhonda Bellamy on the local radio for several weeks.  What happened to her?
text:
As
you correctly observed she is no longer on the air. Her last day was
the same as Oprah Winfrey's. Si Cantwell has scheduled an interview
with Rhonda to get more details on why she left the station and what
she's going to do now. His column is scheduled to run Aug. 21.
